main.description: A set of reciprocal commitments among economic agents, and/or a set of reciprocal economic events.

created.description: The date, and time if desired, the information was agreed to or recorded.

name.description: An informal or formal textual identifier for an object. Does not imply uniqueness.

note.description: Any useful textual information related to the item.

stipulates.description: All the primary commitments that constitute the agreement.

stipulatesReciprocal.description: All the reciprocal commitments that constitute the agreement.

realizes.description: All the non-reciprocal economic events (with or without commitments) that realize the agreement.

realizesReciprocal.description: All the reciprocal economic events (with or without commitments) that realize the agreement.

bundledIn.description: This agreement is bundled with other agreements, for example in an order.
